name: ISO or Image Mount Indicator in Recent Files
description: Detects the creation of recent element file that points to an .ISO, .IMG, .VHD or .VHDX file as often used in phishing attacks. This can be a false positive on server systems but on workstations users should rarely mount .iso or .img files.
false_positives: Cases in which a user mounts an image file for legitimate reasons
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:(*.iso.lnk OR *.img.lnk OR *.vhd.lnk OR *.vhdx.lnk) AND file.path:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Recent\\*)`
